--- title: "Derogations and emergency policies" format: html: code-fold: true editor_options: chunk_output_type: inline --- ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) library(targets) library(broom) library(modelsummary) library(kableExtra) library(ordinal) library(brms) library(marginaleffects) library(tidybayes) library(ggdist) library(bayesplot) library(patchwork) library(scales) # Bayes stuff BAYES_SEED <- 1234 options(mc.cores = 4, brms.backend = "cmdstanr") # Generated via random.org set.seed(2385) # Load targets withr::with_dir(here::here(), { # Final data tar_load(daily_panel) tar_load(weekly_panel) tar_load(year_week_lookup) # Models tar_load(m_prelim_derog) tar_load(m_coef_gof) # Plotting functions invisible(list2env(tar_read(graphic_functions), .GlobalEnv)) }) # Tell bayesplot to use the Lakota palette for things like pp_check() bayesplot::color_scheme_set(clrs[c(1, 2, 4, 5, 7, 8)]) weekly_panel <- weekly_panel %>% mutate(across(c(new_cases, new_deaths, cumulative_cases, cumulative_deaths), list(z = ~as.numeric(scale(.))))) ``` ::: # Model and priors ## Official formal model $$ \begin{aligned} \text{COVID policy}_{i, t} \sim&\ \operatorname{Bernoulli}(\pi_{i, t}) \\ \operatorname{logit}(\pi_{i, t}) =&\ \alpha_{\text{country} [i]} + \beta_1\ \text{Derogation in effect}_{i}\ + \\ &\ \beta_2\ \text{New cases}_{i}\ + \beta_3\ \text{Cumulative cases}_{i}\ + \\ &\ \beta_4\ \text{New deaths}_{i}\ + \beta_5\ \text{Cumulative deaths}_{i}\ + \\ &\ \beta_6\ \text{Week number}_{i} \\ \alpha_j \sim&\ \mathcal{N}(\bar{\alpha}, \sigma_\alpha) \text{, for } j \text{ in } 1 \dots J \\ \\ \bar{\alpha} \sim&\ \operatorname{Student t}(\nu = 1, \mu = 0, \sigma = 3) \\ \beta_{1 \dots 6} \sim&\ \operatorname{Student t}(\nu = 1, \mu = 0, \sigma = 3) \\ \sigma_a \sim&\ \operatorname{Cauchy}(x = 0, \gamma = 1) \text{, lower bound} = 0 \end{aligned} $$ ## Priors ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} p1 <- ggplot() + stat_function(geom = "area", fun = ~extraDistr::dlst(., df = 1, mu = 0, sigma = 3), fill = clrs[2]) + xlim(c(-20, 20)) + annotate(geom = "label", x = 0, y = 0.02, label = "Student t(1, 0, 3)") + labs(x = "α and βs") + theme_pandem(prior = TRUE) ## Warning: The `size` argument of `element_rect()` is deprecated as of ggplot2 3.4.0. ## ℹ Please use the `linewidth` argument instead. ## Warning: The `size` argument of `element_line()` is deprecated as of ggplot2 3.4.0. ## ℹ Please use the `linewidth` argument instead. p2 <- ggplot() + stat_function(geom = "area", fun = ~dcauchy(., 0, 1), fill = clrs[4]) + xlim(c(0, 10)) + annotate(geom = "label", x = 5, y = 0.063, label = "Cauchy(0, 1)") + labs(x = "σ") + theme_pandem(prior = TRUE) p1 | p2 ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](analysis_prelim_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){fig-align='center' width=80%} ::: ::: ## Prior simulation ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="show"} logit_priors <- c(prior(student_t(1, 0, 3), class = Intercept), prior(student_t(1, 0, 3), class = b), prior(cauchy(0, 1), class = sd, lb = 0)) model_prelim_prior_only <- brm( bf(c7_internal_movement_bin ~ derogation_ineffect + new_cases_z + cumulative_cases_z + new_deaths_z + cumulative_deaths_z + prior_iccpr_derogations + prior_iccpr_other_action + year_week_num + (1 | country_name)), data = filter(weekly_panel, c7_internal_movement_never == 0), family = "bernoulli", prior = logit_priors, sample_prior = "only", chains = 4, seed = BAYES_SEED, iter = 5000, refresh = 0, threads = threading(2) # Two CPUs per chain to speed things up ) ## Start sampling ## Running MCMC with 4 parallel chains, with 2 thread(s) per chain... ## ## Chain 2 finished in 2.9 seconds. ## Chain 3 finished in 4.1 seconds. ## Chain 1 finished in 4.2 seconds. ## Chain 4 finished in 6.2 seconds. ## ## All 4 chains finished successfully. ## Mean chain execution time: 4.3 seconds. ## Total execution time: 6.3 seconds. ## Warning: 10 of 10000 (0.0%) transitions hit the maximum treedepth limit of 10. ## See https://mc-stan.org/misc/warnings for details. model_prelim_prior_only ## Family: bernoulli ## Links: mu = logit ## Formula: c7_internal_movement_bin ~ derogation_ineffect + new_cases_z + cumulative_cases_z + new_deaths_z + cumulative_deaths_z + prior_iccpr_derogations + prior_iccpr_other_action + year_week_num + (1 | country_name) ## Data: filter(weekly_panel, c7_internal_movement_never == (Number of observations: 9246) ## Draws: 4 chains, each with iter = 5000; warmup = 2500; thin = 1; ## total post-warmup draws = 10000 ## ## Group-Level Effects: ## ~country_name (Number of levels: 134) ## Estimate Est.Error l-95% CI u-95% CI Rhat Bulk_ESS Tail_ESS ## sd(Intercept) 7.73 254.99 0.04 27.63 1.00 14539 5301 ## ## Population-Level Effects: ## Estimate Est.Error l-95% CI u-95% CI Rhat Bulk_ESS Tail_ESS ## Intercept 37.81 1064.36 -988.00 1155.47 1.00 2582 1241 ## derogation_ineffect 1.44 51.67 -35.25 36.22 1.01 5144 1727 ## new_cases_z 0.90 19.30 -21.75 27.98 1.01 2720 1135 ## cumulative_cases_z -14.83 92.05 -286.37 33.71 1.03 262 67 ## new_deaths_z 0.79 16.45 -25.02 32.21 1.00 5016 1458 ## cumulative_deaths_z 1.05 20.89 -26.74 31.61 1.00 2407 789 ## prior_iccpr_derogationsTRUE 1.31 33.27 -32.84 36.10 1.00 5858 1526 ## prior_iccpr_other_actionTRUE 13.75 73.60 -26.85 298.15 1.03 87 24 ## year_week_num -1.23 30.39 -33.12 28.16 1.00 4702 1260 ## ## Draws were sampled using sample(hmc). For each parameter, Bulk_ESS ## and Tail_ESS are effective sample size measures, and Rhat is the potential ## scale reduction factor on split chains (at convergence, Rhat = 1). ``` ::: ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} datagrid(model = model_prelim_prior_only, year_week_num = 1:69, derogation_ineffect = 0:1) %>% add_epred_draws(model_prelim_prior_only, ndraws = 100) %>% left_join(year_week_lookup, by = "year_week_num") %>% mutate(derogation_ineffect = factor(derogation_ineffect, levels = 0:1, labels = c("No", "Yes"), ordered = TRUE)) %>% ggplot(aes(x = year_week_day, y = .epred, color = derogation_ineffect)) + geom_line(aes(group = paste(.draw, derogation_ineffect)), alpha = 0.5, linewidth = 0.5) + scale_color_manual(values = c(clrs[1], clrs[8])) + scale_x_date(date_breaks = "2 months", date_labels = "%b\n%Y") + scale_y_continuous(labels = label_percent()) + labs(x = NULL, y = "Predicted probability", color = "Derogation in effect", title = "Movement (priors only)") + theme_pandem() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](analysis_prelim_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){fig-align='center' width=80%} ::: ::: # Posterior ::: {#tbl-prelim .cell layout-align="center" hash='analysis_prelim_cache/html/tbl-prelim_48d8ba7ca17e0e2065b785c082ea14f5'} ```{.r .cell-code} modelsummary(pull(m_prelim_derog, model, name = nice), estimate = "{estimate}", statistic = "conf.int", fmt = 2, coef_map = m_coef_gof$coef_map, gof_map = m_coef_gof$gof_map, metrics = c("R2")) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}

````` ::: ::: # Model evaluation ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} prelim_trace <- function(model) { model %>% gather_draws(b_Intercept, b_derogation_ineffect, b_year_week_num, sd_country_name__Intercept) %>% ggplot(aes(x = .iteration, y = .value, color = factor(.chain))) + geom_line(linewidth = 0.1) + scale_color_viridis_d(option = "rocket", end = 0.85) + labs(color = "Chain") + facet_wrap(vars(.variable), scales = "free_y") + theme_pandem() } prelim_trank <- function(model) { model %>% gather_draws(b_Intercept, b_derogation_ineffect, b_year_week_num, sd_country_name__Intercept) %>% group_by(.variable) %>% mutate(draw_rank = rank(.value)) %>% ggplot(aes(x = draw_rank, color = factor(.chain))) + stat_bin(geom = "step", binwidth = 200, position = position_identity(), boundary = 0) + scale_color_viridis_d(option = "rocket", end = 0.85) + labs(color = "Chain") + facet_wrap(vars(.variable), scales = "free_y") + theme_pandem() } prelim_pp <- function(model) { pp_check(model, ndraws = 100, type = "bars") } ``` ::: ::: {.panel-tabset} ### Cancel Public Events ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} prelim_trace(m_prelim_derog$model[[1]]) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](analysis_prelim_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){fig-align='center' width=80%} ::: ::: ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} prelim_trank(m_prelim_derog$model[[1]]) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](analysis_prelim_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){fig-align='center' width=80%} ::: ::: ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} prelim_pp(m_prelim_derog$model[[1]]) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} prelim_trace(m_prelim_derog$model[[5]]) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](analysis_prelim_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-17-1.png){fig-align='center' width=80%} ::: ::: ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} prelim_trank(m_prelim_derog$model[[5]]) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](analysis_prelim_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-18-1.png){fig-align='center' width=80%} ::: ::: ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} prelim_pp(m_prelim_derog$model[[5]]) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](analysis_prelim_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-19-1.png){fig-align='center' width=80%} ::: ::: ::: # Interpretation and marginal effects ## Predictions ::: {.column-page-right} ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} preliminary_models_plots <- m_prelim_derog %>% mutate(pred_plot = map2(model, nice, ~{ datagrid(model = .x, year_week_num = 1:69, derogation_ineffect = 0:1) %>% add_epred_draws(.x) %>% left_join(year_week_lookup, by = "year_week_num") %>% mutate(derogation_ineffect = factor(derogation_ineffect, levels = 0:1, labels = c("No", "Yes"), ordered = TRUE)) %>% ggplot(aes(x = year_week_day, y = .epred, color = derogation_ineffect)) + stat_lineribbon(aes(fill = derogation_ineffect), alpha = 0.3) + scale_color_manual(values = c(clrs[1], clrs[8])) + scale_fill_manual(values = c(clrs[1], clrs[8])) + scale_x_date(date_breaks = "2 months", date_labels = "%b\n%Y") + scale_y_continuous(labels = label_percent()) + labs(x = NULL, y = "Predicted probability", color = "Derogation in effect", fill = "Derogation in effect", title = .y) + theme_pandem() })) wrap_plots(preliminary_models_plots$pred_plot) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](analysis_prelim_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-20-1.png){fig-align='center' width=100%} ::: ::: ::: ## Marginal effects ::: {.column-page-right} ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} preliminary_models_mfx <- m_prelim_derog %>% mutate(mfx = map(model, ~{ .x %>% marginaleffects(newdata = datagrid(year_week_num = 1:69), variables = "derogation_ineffect", type = "response") |> posteriordraws() })) %>% mutate(mfx_plot = map2(mfx, nice, ~{ .x %>% left_join(year_week_lookup, by = "year_week_num") %>% ggplot(aes(x = year_week_day, y = draw * 100)) + stat_lineribbon(alpha = 0.25, fill = clrs[5], color = clrs[5]) + scale_x_date(date_breaks = "2 months", date_labels = "%b\n%Y") + labs(x = NULL, y = "Percentage point change\nin probability of policy", title = .y) + theme_pandem() })) wrap_plots(preliminary_models_mfx$mfx_plot) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](analysis_prelim_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-21-1.png){fig-align='center' width=100%} ::: ::: :::
